com.samsung.samm.common

Class SObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SObjectFilling, SObjectGroup, SObjectImage, SObjectStroke, SObjectText, SObjectVideo

    public abstract class SObject
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract SAMM object class for exchanging data.
    The SAMM Object can be a stroke, image, text, or other format. This contains common properties that can be shared with each object.
    Each object is created by inheriting from this class.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getStyle

        public int getStyle()
        Gets the style of the object (details for each object). (The details may not be valid for some objects.)
        The stroke object can be a value representing the style of the stroke such as brush, pencil, or marker.
        Use this if you want to use the predefined compliant style for each object.
        Returns:
        The style of the object
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getColor

        public int getColor()
        Gets the color value of the object. (The details may not be valid for some objects.)
        Returns:
        The color value of the object (ARGB)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getSize

        public float getSize()
        Gets the size (thickness) of the object. (The details may not be valid for some objects.)
        Returns:
        The size of the object
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getRect

        public RectF getRect()
        Gets the area of the object. (The details may not be valid for some objects.)
        This is the original area that does not apply the rotation angle settings.
        It is advisable to set the image object along with the rotation angle and area if the image object is rotated by 90 degrees.
        Namely, if the image is rotated by 90 degrees with area dimensions of 320x240, it is recommended that you set the image so that it is rotated by 0 degrees with area dimensions of 240x320.
        Returns:
        The area of the object
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getRotateAngle

        public float getRotateAngle()
        Gets the rotation angle of the object. (The details may not be valid for some objects.)
        Returns:
        The rotation angle (degrees) of the object
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • putExtra

        public boolean putExtra(java.lang.String keyName,
               java.lang.String data)
        Sets the extension data in the object as a string. (If the same keyName exists, overwrite it; otherwise, add it.)
        You can add an application dependent data string type.
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key name that identifies the data
        data - The extension data value specified as the data keyName
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
